articles.author: Michael Casey
articles.title: Judge blocks Trump administration’s from passport changes affecting transgender Americans - AP News
articles.description: A federal judge has partially blocked the Trump administration from enacting a policy that bans the use of “X” marker used by many nonbinary people on passports as well as the changing of gender markers. In an executive order signed in January, the president …
articles.content: BOSTON (AP) A federal judge on Friday partially blocked the Trump administration from enacting a policy that bans the use of X marker used by many nonbinary people on passports as well as the changin… [+4168 chars]
